entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
